aboutMe:
A fun person who enjoys being challenged!  I organise and play in the Sharesies football team, Footsies as well as am an avid member of the company boxing group.

I love making things look pretty and be perfect.
I am a performing, just wrapping up a season of performing Translations in the Gryphon theatre, coming from improv comedy.

workExperiences.description: Worked primarily as a Full Stack Developer building out the internal software required for operators to perform business critical operations. Backend was in Python 3.8 deploying in the cloud using AWS with the frontend in Jinja2, React, HTML and TypeScript / JavaScript. Some of the services included work in .NET and I did a bit of infrastructure work with Terraform.

I worked on several interesting projects including an Audio Classifier used to classify the South Island Kokako. The job primarily involved working with AWS, Kubernetes, ML frameworks such as TensorFlow and FastAI.
Tutored people and lead a team of 6 tutors.

educationExperiences.description: Bachelor of Engineering, majoring in Software Engineering with First Class Honours, BE(Hons)
First Class Honours, majoring in Software Engineerin
